project_abstract.cdata: The Hunan Power Development Project aims to alleviate power shortages by providing an efficient, reliable, and environmentally sound power supply. There are four components. The Leiyang Power Plant Component supplies and installs two additional anthracite-fired generating units to alleviate power shortages, improve the generation mix, and facilitate the retirement of 10 small, aging, inefficient, and polluting generating units in the provincial power grid. The second, the Transmission Component, reinforces the existing network and constructs transmission lines and a number of substations with line transfer capability. The third component comprises technical assistance for construction management, advisory services to help implement the electric power company's (HEPC) restructuring plan, and consulting services for HEPC's organization restructuring and improvement of its financial management system. The fourth component consists of a management development and training program designed to enhance HEPC's managerial, legal, technical, and financial capabilities.

P035698.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>湖南电力发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目主要内容包括新建两个现代化的火电机组；加强临界输电基础设施以改善整个系统的可靠性；淘汰一批小型、低效、老化和造成污染的机组；防止效率低和污染严重的小型电厂进一步扩散，从而巩固和加强电力供应基础设施，改善环保。该项目通过将发电与输、配电分开管理，设立比较易于预测和透明度较高的商业框架，建立允许购买电力时进行竞争性招标的行业结构，鼓励输、配电投资，最终目标是在湖南省建立起完全竞争性的电力市场。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
